notes: REACH Initiative support the Camp Coordination and Camp Management (CCCM) cluster by conducting Quarterly IDP Camp Profiling in order to comprehensively monitor the camps and to provide regular and updated information on developments, needs, and gaps in all accessible IDP camps across Iraq. To date, CCCM and REACH have conducted seven rounds of IDP Camp Profiling and mapping – in October 2014, January 2015, September/October 2015, December 2015, April 2016, August/September 2016 and December 2016/January 2017. This dataset contains findings from December 2016/January 2017. This exercise covered camps located in the governorates of Anbar, Baghdad, Dahuk, Diyala, Erbil, Kerbala, Kirkuk, Missan, Najaf, Ninewa, Salah al-Din and Sulaymaniyah.
